text:
Viktor Izrailyovych Kanevskyi (,; 3 October 1936 – 25 November 2018) was a Ukrainian and Soviet football player and coach. He was born to a Jewish family in Kiev. He played for Soviet national team and for Dynamo Kyiv. He also managed Metalist Kharkiv and Dnipro.
Kanevskyi died in Bristol, Connecticut on 25 November 2018 from brain cancer at the age of 82.
